name: Hresvelgr
summary: Hresvelgr is a futuristic racing game for the PlayStation 2, also released in Europe under the title Jet Ion GP.

name: Hrdina
summary: The game is about a hero that goes from game to the real world. Levels are generated by the music which is provided by Czech band Zrní.

name: Hrot
summary: Hrot is a single-player retro FPS set in a small socialist country neighboring Soviet Union (Czechoslovakia) after an unspecified disaster in 1986. Those times were dark and terrifying and so is the game.

name: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer
summary: HRO: Adventures of a Humanoid Resources Officer is a puzzle-driven visual novel set in a retro sci-fi universe. When the Endeavor stumbles into universe-shaking trouble, can you harness the power of the bureaucracy to rein in your crew’s worst impulses and survive to the next episode?

name: HR2
summary: HR2 is a tower building simulator where your goal is to build a highrise building as tall as possible. Your concerns are not with floor designs or business strategies. Instead, in HR2 your role is that of a contractor/engineer commissioned to build the tower. Therefore, your goal is to build the tower with structurally sound design to guarantee that it will not come crashing down once you get to the 10th floor.

name: Hrima
summary: It's an indie game where you start in a weird facility kind of place and your goal is to escape this place as fast as you can by solving puzzles and parkour. This game is meant to be Speedrunned.

name: Hroogar
summary: Hroogar, the King of Atheron, has offered a reward for defeating the red Dragon. Defeat the red Dragon and become a dragon slayer!!

name: H-Rescue
summary: You want the girls? You want to become a Hero? You have to rescue em all! H-Rescue is a game that combines match-2, simple puzzle and beauties. How the story goes is based on your choices, and the fate of the girls will be in your hands. Beware the bad choices. But first, can you rescue em all?

name: Hrumka
summary: A rogue-like battler on a match-3 board. Match gems to attack enemies, avoid damage and gather collectibles. Use your level-up upgrades to become stronger and try different play styles. Be careful though - enemies can also level up!

name: HRT Simulator 2023
summary: A very sincere and heartfelt shitpost about a guy doing his first shot of HRT.

name: HR Simulator
summary: An HR management simulator about navigating workplace dynamics, hiring and training a diverse workforce, and balancing professional growth with personal life in a bustling cityscape.

name: HR: Human Remains
summary: You are an ordinary office clerk in a not-so-ordinary world ruled by demons. One of them is your boss. Will you lead the company to success, or will you try to hold on to your humanity?

name: Hrolfr vs. Evil Skulls
summary: "Hrolfr VS Evil Skulls" is a 2D third-person action RPG, where you as a mighty warrior Hrolfr the Walker fight evil creatures in a dark fantasy world inspired by Estonian folklore, Cthulhu Mythos and old-school sword&sorcery B-movies. Save the world, fight Evil Skulls, rescue the princess!
